languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс поднимает голову. Облако холода, окутывающее его, начинает развеиваться.{/n} "{name}... ты разыскивала меня? Я постарался найти место поспокойнее, чтобы восстановиться после пыток".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс поднимает голову. Облако холода, окутывающее его, начинает развеиваться.{/n} "{name}... ты разыскивала меня? Я постарался найти место поспокойнее, чтобы восстановиться после пыток".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс поднимает голову. Облако холода, окутывающее его, начинает развеиваться.{/n} "{name}... ты разыскивала меня? Я постарался найти место поспокойнее, чтобы восстановиться после пыток".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."

{n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."

{n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."

{n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."

languages.text: {n}海因里希抬起了头，身边冰冷的雾气开始消散。{/n}“{name}……你一直都在找我吗？我只是想找个地方休息一下，从折磨的痛苦中恢复过来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希抬起了头，身边冰冷的雾气开始消散。{/n}“{name}……你一直都在找我吗？我只是想找个地方休息一下，从折磨的痛苦中恢复过来。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix levanta la cabeza. La neblina helada que le rodea empieza a disiparse.{/n} «{name}... ¿me estaba buscando? He intentado encontrar un lugar aislado para recuperarme de la tortura».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix levanta la cabeza. La neblina helada que le rodea empieza a disiparse.{/n} «{name}... ¿me estaba buscando? He intentado encontrar un lugar aislado para recuperarme de la tortura».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスが頭を上げる。彼を包んでいた冷たい靄が消え始める。{/n}「{name}…俺を探していたのか？俺は、どこか苦しみから立ち直れる場所を探していたんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスが頭を上げる。彼を包んでいた冷たい靄が消え始める。{/n}「{name}…俺を探していたのか？俺は、どこか苦しみから立ち直れる場所を探していたんだ」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lève la tête. Autour de lui, la brume glaciale commence à se dissiper.{/n} « {name}... Vous me cherchiez ? Je voulais m'isoler le temps de me remettre de la torture. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lève la tête. Autour de lui, la brume glaciale commence à se dissiper.{/n} « {name}... Vous me cherchiez ? Je voulais m'isoler le temps de me remettre de la torture. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hebt den Kopf. Der kalte Dunst um ihn herum beginnt sich verflüchtigen.{/n} "{name} ... Habt Ihr nach mir gesucht? Ich wollte einen abgelegenen Ort finden, wo ich mich von der Folter erholen konnte."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hebt den Kopf. Der kalte Dunst um ihn herum beginnt sich verflüchtigen.{/n} "{name} ... Habt Ihr nach mir gesucht? Ich wollte einen abgelegenen Ort finden, wo ich mich von der Folter erholen konnte."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix başını kaldırıyor. Etrafını saran soğuk pus, dağılmaya başlıyor.{/n} "{name}... Beni mi arıyordun? Bu eziyetten toparlanabileceğim, gözden uzakta bir yer bulmaya çalışmıştım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head. The cold haze that surrounds him begins to dissipate.{/n} "{name}... have you been looking for me? I tried to find somewhere out of the way where I could recover from the torture."
